awards.description: DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE OTOE-MISSOURIA TRIBE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS.ACTIVITIES:SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD ENVIRONMENTAL CAPACITY BY MANAGING THE ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE, OUTREACH, AIR QUALITY AND RECYCLING.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS, ANNUAL FFR, QMP, AND GIS/GPS QAPP. THE INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE OTOE-MISSOURIA TRIBE OF OKLAHOMA.

DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE TRIBE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. ACTIVITIES:SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL MANAGE THE ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE, PROVIDE OUTREACH, POLLUTION PREVENTION THROUGH RECYCLING, AND IMPROVE KNOWLEDGE OF AIR QUALITY.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS, ANNUAL FEDERAL FINANCIAL REPORT, QUALITY MANAGEMENT PLAN, AND GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM/GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM QUALITY ASSURANCE PROJECT PLAN. THE INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE OTOE-MISSOURIA TRIBE OF INDIANS.
OTOE-MISSOURIA TRANSPORTATION IMPROVEMENT PLANNING (TIP) NEW CONTRACT 2019
OTOE MISSOURIA TRIBE, TRANSPORTATION PLANNING IMPROVEMENT (TIP) CONTRACT RENEWAL.

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
Department of Housing and Urban Development

awards.description: THIS AGREEMENT WILL PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE OTOE-MISSOURIA TRIBE IN ITS EFFORTS TO ADDRESS AIR POLLUTION CONTROL CONCERNS ON THE TRIBAL RESERVATIONS IN THE STATE OF OKLAHOMA INCLUDING CONDUCTING AN EMISSIONS INVENTORY OF AIR SOURCES IMPACTING TRIBAL LANDS.
